original_title: Sanasa Life Insurance launches biggest consumer promotion in its history
original_body_lines: SANASA Life Insurance has accomplished yet another milestone along with the launch of ‘Heenalanthaya,’ the largest consumer promotion in the organization’s history. This promotion is designed to provide SANASA Life Insurance policyholders and those who wish to participate in the grand draw, with numerous opportunities to win prizes.

The promotion also aligns with SANASA’s long-standing ethic of outreach, which is focused on providing accessible and affordable insurance solutions to underserved, low-income communities. This promotion is open to all clients around the country who have embarked on a life insurance cover with SANASA.

Eligibility requires clients to secure a new life insurance policy and complete three consecutive premium payments. A policyholder who has consistently paid premiums over a longer term in addition to being eligible, will also increase their chances of winning.

The promotion offers a wide range of incredible prizes across several categories: monthly, quarterly and grand Prizes This includes tours of India, Malaysia, and Singapore. The pinnacle of the prizes will take eight winners to explore Europe, a unique opportunity to experience its rich history, culture, art, and culinary traditions.
